title: Track Campaign Performance
description: A marketing analyst wants to check the performance of an email campaign that was sent yesterday.

tasks.description: Log into the marketing analytics platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst accesses the reporting tools.

tasks.description: Locate the specific email campaign and open its performance dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst finds the report for the correct campaign.

tasks.description: Review key metrics such as open rate, click-through rate, and revenue generated from the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst can measure the effectiveness and ROI of the marketing campaign.
